Key_Features: Vehicle health alerts, driver behavior, fuel optimization, severe incident notifications
OEM-grade data access for authorized TSPs, no aftermarket hardware needed
Mobile app for iOS/Android, daily vehicle checks, issue reporting
Support for all vehicle makes and models, unified dashboard, plug-in device leaves OBD-II port available
EV-specific data, charge management, public and home charging, remote pre-conditioning
Real-time audio coaching for speeding, harsh acceleration/braking, idling, seatbelt
